list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small oval fruit with a hard pit and bitter flesh, green when unripe and brownish black when ripe, used as food and as a source of oil.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a dish of cauliflower with black olives
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một món súp lơ với ô liu đen

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the widely cultivated evergreen tree that yields the olive, native to warm regions of the Old World.
a grayish-green color like that of an unripe olive.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: shades of gold, olive, and black
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: sắc thái của vàng, ô liu và màu đen

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a marine mollusk with a smooth, roughly cylindrical shell which is typically brightly colored.
a metal ring or fitting which is tightened under a threaded nut to form a seal, as in a compression joint.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a small figure in olive fatigues
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một hình nhỏ trong mệt mỏi ô liu
